root.name: NFL Street 2

BlitzZone SpyLeft FieldCorner Blast1 Deep SpyPrevent SpyAll ZonePreventQuad Zone4 DeepMan-To-ManOuter AttackCB Spy Unlockables PasswardsThe are a number of NFL Legends that can be unlocked. To unlock the legends, players must perform a hot spot play on each field to unlock the respective NFL legend. There are 11 unlockable legends. Unlockable How to Unlock Anthony Munoz The Cage Bo Jackson Sportsplex Cris Carter The Alley Darrell Green The Backlot Jack Lambert Royal Park Joey Browner The Dig Mean Joe Greene The Tracks Mike Singletary Second St. Station NFL Legends Team EA Field Randall Cunningham Imperial Tower Sterling Sharpe The Aqueduct There are a couple of unlockable teams. By completing the NFL Gauntlet, you will unlock the Gridiron Pack. When Training is complete, Xzibit's Team is unlocked. Passwords Passwords can be entered by going to the cheat code screen in the game modes section. Effect Password 10X Gamebreaker XxGBCraZ AFC East All-Stars EAASFSCT AFC North All-Stars NAOFRCTH AFC South All-Stars SAOFUCTH AFC West All-Stars WAEFSCT All players will have a maxed out Catching stat. MagnetHands EA Field EAField In quick game mode, fumbles will not happen on hits and tackles. This code cannot be enabled with fumble mode. GlueHands Makes your opponent fumble the ball.
